article_title: Deadly strike shows aid workers' protection in crisis, agencies say
sentence: A  UN  official  says  the  Israeli  attack  which  killed  seven  staff  of  the  charity  World  Central  Kitchen  (WCK)  is  either  a  "dreadful  failure  of  deconfliction"  or  evidence  that  the  system  that  exists  now  is  not  fit  for  purpose.

sentence: Israel  has  acknowledged  it  killed  the  WCK  staff.
